General Mounting

ONIITO hangs pictures, mirrors, and feature wall art with millimeter precision — laser-aligned, safely anchored, and perfectly centered for balanced interiors.

What you get

  • Laser alignment — flawless straight lines and symmetry.
  • Proper anchors — drywall, concrete, and brick walls handled safely.
  • Balanced layout — perfect heights and even spacing.
  • Clean finish — no visible screws or dust left behind.

 

Recent work

Feature wall installation

Mounted a large decorative piece around a structural column using concealed anchors and precise edge alignment — seamless and safe visual integration.

Centered wall composition

Perfect centering above a media console; laser alignment, even spacing, and cable concealment ensure a clean, balanced result.

Symmetrical pairs

Two framed artworks installed between wall sconces with exact symmetry and equal spacing — aligned with headboard centerline for a built-in look.

Process

  1. Plan — layout concept, height and spacing grid.
  2. Mount — laser marking, correct anchors, precise leveling.
  3. Finish — symmetry check, cleanup, final polish.

FAQ

Do you handle heavy frames and mirrors?

Yes, we use appropriate anchors and distribute load safely for drywall, studs, and masonry walls.

Can you create gallery walls or symmetrical pairs?

Absolutely. We design layouts with equal spacing and perfect alignment using professional laser tools.

Is the installation dust-free and clean?

Yes, we drill precisely, capture dust, and clean up before leaving — your room stays spotless.
